instructions.name: buy
docs: Buys tokens from a bonding curve.

instructions.name: cancel_streamer_identity
docs: Claims creator's share of fees (can be claimed by creator or withdraw authority)
Cancel a streamer identity registration (only callable by platform authority)

accounts.name: platform_authority
docs: The platform authority that can cancel Streamer identities

accounts.name: user
docs: The user's wallet to unlink

accounts.name: streamer_identity
docs: The StreamerIdentity account to close

accounts.name: streamer_id_registry
docs: Registry to ensure streamer_id uniqueness

instructions.name: claim_donations
docs: Claim all unclaimed donations for a creator

instructions.name: claim_early_bird_rewards
docs: Claim early bird rewards for eligible holders

instructions.name: create
docs: Creates a new coin and bonding curve.

instructions.name: init_holder_stats
docs: Initialize holder stats account

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Creates the global state.

instructions.name: reassign_fee_recipient
docs: Reassigns the fee recipient for a token, overriding creator wallet and/or streamer ID
Only callable by platform authority as a failsafe for community protection

accounts.name: platform_authority
docs: The platform authority that can reassign fee recipients

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint for the token

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: The bonding curve to update

instructions.name: register_streamer_identity
docs: Register a streamer identity (only callable by platform authority)

accounts.name: platform_authority
docs: The platform authority that can register Streamer identities

accounts.name: user
docs: The user's wallet to link with Streamer

accounts.name: streamer_identity
docs: The StreamerIdentity account to create

accounts.name: streamer_id_registry
docs: Registry to ensure streamer_id uniqueness

instructions.name: sell
docs: Sells tokens into a bonding curve.

instructions.name: send_message
docs: Send a message with a donation to a creator

instructions.name: set_params
docs: Sets the global state parameters.

instructions.name: update_holder_stats
docs: Update holder stats and top holders list

errors.name: InvalidFeeShares
errors.msg: Fee shares must add up to 100% (10000 basis points)

errors.name: InvalidStreamerId
errors.msg: Invalid or missing streamer ID

errors.name: StreamerIdAlreadyRegistered
errors.msg: Streamer ID already registered to another wallet

errors.name: UnauthorizedCreator
errors.msg: Unauthorized creator

errors.name: NoFeesToClaim
errors.msg: No fees available to claim

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.msg: The given account is not authorized to execute this instruction.

errors.name: AlreadyInitialized
errors.msg: The program is already initialized.

errors.name: TooMuchSolRequired
errors.msg: slippage: Too much SOL required to buy the given amount of tokens.

errors.name: TooLittleSolReceived
errors.msg: slippage: Too little SOL received to sell the given amount of tokens.

errors.name: MintDoesNotMatchBondingCurve
errors.msg: The mint does not match the bonding curve.

errors.name: BondingCurveComplete
errors.msg: The bonding curve has completed and liquidity migrated to raydium.

errors.name: BondingCurveNotComplete
errors.msg: The bonding curve has not completed.

errors.name: NotInitialized
errors.msg: The program is not initialized.

errors.name: UnauthorizedUser
errors.msg: Unauthorized user

errors.name: SlippageExceeded
errors.msg: Slippage tolerance exceeded

errors.name: InsufficientTreasuryFunds
errors.msg: Insufficient funds in treasury for buyback

errors.name: MessageTooLong
errors.msg: Message exceeds maximum length of 200 characters

errors.name: NoDonationsToClaim
errors.msg: No donations available to claim

errors.name: InsufficientDonationAmount
errors.msg: Insufficient donation amount

errors.name: UnauthorizedDonationClaim
errors.msg: Only the creator or withdraw authority can claim donations

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount

errors.name: EarlyBirdDisabled
errors.msg: Early bird rewards are disabled

errors.name: NotEarlyBird
errors.msg: User is not an early bird (not in first X buyers)

errors.name: NoRewardsToClaim
errors.msg: No rewards available to claim

errors.name: NoEarlyBirds
errors.msg: No early birds registered yet

errors.name: BuyAmountTooSmall
errors.msg: Buy amount below minimum required for Early Bird eligibility

errors.name: CurveNotComplete
errors.msg: Bonding curve must be complete before claiming Early Bird rewards

errors.name: AlreadyClaimedEarlyBird
errors.msg: Early Bird rewards already claimed - can only claim once

errors.name: ArithmeticOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow or underflow
